S

Sender - Class in network
The Sender class is an abstraction for a client Socket.
Sender(String, int) - Constructor for class network.Sender
Constructor for a Sender.
sendMessage(String) - Method in class network.Sender
Method used for sending a message package.
setForwardsMessages(boolean) - Method in class mf.MessageBusFactory
Setter for the boolean defining whether this application should forward incoming messages to peers.
setIdentifier(String) - Method in class mf.MessageBusFactory
Setter for the variable identifier.
setInitialTimeToLive(int) - Method in class mf.MessageBusFactory
Setter for the time to live parameter.
setMessageCapacity(int) - Method in class mf.MessageBusFactory
Setter for the message capacity.
setServerPort(int) - Method in class mf.MessageBusFactory
Setter for the server port.
setValue(String, String, String) - Method in class utilities.MessageConverter
Basic function for setting a new value to a json field
start() - Method in class network.Receiver
Method used to start the receiver and therefore start listening to incoming messages .
stop() - Method in interface mf.MessageBus
Allows you to stop all threads of the message bus.
stop() - Method in class mf.MessageBusController
Allows you to stop all threads of the message bus.
stopDelivering() - Method in class utilities.MessageDeliverer
 
stopReceiving() - Method in class network.Receiver
Method used to stop the receiver and therefore stop listening to incoming messages .
